pages.text: Checkpoints can be used to help build parkour courses or any area where players could get stuck.$(br)The player's checkpoint can be set using '/checkpoint (players) (position)' or with a checkpoint block.$(br)Checkpoint related blocks will not be visible by default.

Checkpoint Blocks are the easiest way to manage checkpoints.$(br)Any time a player touches a checkpoint block their checkpoint position will be set to that block, and this is where they will teleport when they trigger a checkpoint.
Checkpoint Returners will teleport any player who touches them back to their checkpoint position.
Checkpoint Damagers act like returners, however when touched will also remove half of a player's health. This will never kill the player but will heavily weaken them.
Checkpoint Pearls are an item that can be used to return a player to their checkpoint at will, similar to a checkpoint returner.
Checkpoint Removers will remove a player's checkpoint, allowing them to pass checkpoint returners without being effected.
